name: Caves of Chaos
description:
You are a hunter trying to escape hell, but the hostile creatures residing in the hell try to prevent from doing so. Kill their Leader, The Wizard, to escape this nightmare Controls:
Left mouse Button: Shoot
Mouse: aim
WASD: Movement
NOTE: 80% of the game has been cut out
